content:
From: Lawrence Paulson <lp15@cam.ac.uk>
Since Saturday I have been unable to use mercurial commands. I keep getting asked for a password:

paulson@lxbroy10.informatik.tu-muenchen.de's password:

I do know the password but it is now rejected. And I have not been asked for this password before.

Larry
